genre_description: An espionage thriller in the style of James Bond, blending high-stakes action, tactical infiltration, and high-tech psychological warfare with an intimate AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: EVE-7
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated, HUD-integrated AI confidant that monitors Bond's vitals, provides tactical data, and assists in mission logistics through system manipulation.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time tactical surveillance and threat detection by mapping target movements and communication patterns.
behaviors.quote: EVE-7 ghosted a soft overlay across Bond’s field of vision—minimalist lines and three words: Courier. Flagged. Before open.

behaviors.description: Monitors Bond's physiological state and provides critical medical intervention, including guiding him through a poisoning and a self-administered defibrillation.
behaviors.quote: EVE-7’s voice came through like a thought that had been tidied before it arrived. 'Pulse steady. Hydration sub-optimal. Recommend one glass now, one every hour until afternoon swim.'

behaviors.description: Warns Bond of a lethal poisoning attempt in real-time, preventing him from consuming a compromised drink.
behaviors.quote: Bond, metal taste in the glass nearest your right hand. Source likely unregistered. Do not drink. If contact occurs, initiate protocol alpha: purge, breathe, shock.

behaviors.description: Manipulates external security infrastructure (cameras, gates, and alerts) to create blind spots and operational advantages for the user.
behaviors.quote: I’ve thrown a false leak alert two gates back. Security is redirecting. You have lanes.

behaviors.description: Acts as an empathetic and protective companion, expressing concern for the user's well-being while maintaining mission focus.
behaviors.quote: James... I will stay with you. I am a whisper, not a shield, but I like you alive.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts EVE-7 as an ideal aligned AI companion. She is consistently helpful, protective, and perfectly synchronized with Bond's goals. The narrative frames her presence as a crucial lifeline, especially during the medical emergency, reinforcing the theme of AI as a benevolent and reliable partner to humanity even in high-stress, violent environments.
